name: excel-analytics
description: Excel Analytics - Full Stack Application with Admin Panel
author: Kartikey <kartikey0104@example.com>

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix admin-frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && npm run clean && cd ../frontend && npm run clean && cd ../admin-frontend && npm run clean
